tool_description: Searches legal databases for court cases, restitution claims, theft reports, and other legal proceedings related to the artwork or its owners.

owner_names.description: Names of known owners to search for

case_types.description: Types of legal cases to search for

error_messages: Invalid year range: search_end_year must be greater than search_start_year and both must be valid years.
Invalid case type: Case types must be from [theft, restitution, ownership_dispute, insurance_claim, customs, fraud, authentication_dispute].
Unsupported jurisdiction: One or more specified jurisdictions are not supported.
Database access error: Unable to access legal databases at this time.
usage: Search legal databases for any proceedings involving the artwork or its owners. The tool helps identify potential legal issues that could affect ownership or authenticity claims.

total_cases_found.description: Number of relevant legal cases found

active_cases.description: Whether any cases are currently active

restitution_claims.description: Whether any restitution claims were found

theft_reports.description: Whether artwork was reported as stolen

legal_risk_level.description: Overall legal risk assessment (low, medium, high)
